import React from 'react' import { isAuthenticated } from '../auth' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { IMG_URL } from '../config' const ConfirmOrder = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const cartItems = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cartItems')) const shippingInfo = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('shippingInfo')) const { user } = isAuthenticated() const totalPrice = cartItems.reduce((ac, item) => (ac + item.quantity * item.price), 0) return ( <>

Shipping Info

Name: {user.name}
Email: {user.email}
City: {shippingInfo.city}
Phone Number: {shippingInfo.phone}
Country: {shippingInfo.country}
Shipping Address: {shippingInfo.shippingAddress1}, {shippingInfo.shippingAddress2}
) } export default ConfirmOrder
